entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Use ValueTuple element names in minimal route handlers #40510
  • [API Review]: Add support for endpoint filters in minimal APIs #40506
  • Hot reload doesn't work on F5 but works when run `dotnet watch` #40502
  • Generate typescript type definitions for invoking Blazor libraries #40499
  • ANCM intermittently notifies the wrong HttpContext of disconnect #40498
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor Webassembly - Debugger crashes app #40497
  • Passing tab character to API returns bad request #40495
  • Blazor hosted site thorw 503 on IIS and IIS Express, works fine in kestrel #40494

Closed

  • HttpLoggingMiddleware logs an "empty" message for Response when disabled #40427
    7.0-preview3
  • Custom configuration provider with options pattern always returns empty values #40490
  • Source generators from M.E.Logging.Abstractions conflict with source generators in the transport package #34048
    7.0-preview3
  • [7.0 preview 1] HTTP DELETE sometimes treated as HTTP POST #40301
  • React to hostfxr locating logic #8838
    7.0-preview3

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Update Selenium versions #40509
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Ensure error boundary service is registered as part of call to AddBlazorWebView #40508
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Build .rpm packages for linux arm64 #40504
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Default to 3 local retries #40503
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Add support for endpoint filters in minimal APIs #40491
    area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • [main] Update Selenium versions #40488
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • Correct Identity.Test project #40492
    area-infrastructure, area-identity, 7.0-preview3
  • Ensure error boundary service is registered as part of call to AddBlazorWebView #40487
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview3
  • Enable trimming for Http.Abstractions #40430
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3
  • Bump karma from 6.3.14 to 6.3.16 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/FunctionalTests #40500
    area-signalr, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 7.0-preview3
  • Don't always create log for Response in HttpLoggingMiddleware #40457
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3
  • Bump url-parse from 1.5.7 to 1.5.10 in /src/Components/Web.JS #40441
    area-blazor, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 7.0-preview3
  • [release/5.0] Use WixBundleName instead of WixBundle #40351
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • [release/3.1] Use WixBundleName instead of WixBundle #40352
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [release/5.0] Resolve Component Governance bugs #40218
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.16
  • [release/3.1] Resolve Component Governance bugs #40220
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.24
  • Mark -internal blobs as nonshipping #40380
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • [release/6.0] Use WixBundleName instead of WixBundle #40350
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Build .rpm's for Mariner 2 #40477
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.4
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `9ae11ce` to `3d16ec4` #40470
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.4
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4517697` to `c9461a9` #40469
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.4
  • [release/6.0] Resolve Component Governance bugs #40217
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.4
  • Enable IDE0060 #40461
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • Use libnethost to find hostfxr #39810
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3

Updated

  • Partition some pools by core #40476
    Perf, area-runtime
  • Add gRPC JSON transcoding #40242
    area-grpc
  • Working ANCM arm64 installers #39523
    area-runtime
  • Add/Modify Url Encoding/Decoding for IIS UrlRewrite #40483
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • return value for single HttpContext parameter #40235
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Cleanup logs after successful test runs #40411
    area-infrastructure
  • Add Request Decompression middleware #40279
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • feat (Minimal) : Add `EmptyResult` #40171
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Add a switch to defer rendering of components in ComponentTagHelper #40316
    area-blazor
  • Build .rpm packages for linux arm64 #40485
    area-infrastructure
  • Remove downlevel runtimes from global.json #40393
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/5.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4517697` to `c9461a9` #40467
    area-infrastructure, 5.0.x
